LanguageData.RequireMedicalSkill_BBS_Tag: Does this item require medical skill to use?
LanguageData.Amount_BBS_Tag: How much blood each blood pack contains as a percentage of a pawn's total blood (i.e 0.1 will restore 10% blood loss).
LanguageData.HarvestEfficiencyFactor_BBS_Tag: How efficient harvesting blood is. This affects how much blood is taken to produce one blood pack (i.e. 0.5, or half efficiency, will take double the amount set in 'Blood amount contained' from the donor).
LanguageData.BloodLossReqdForBadThought_BBS: Minimum blood loss for negative thought
LanguageData.BloodLossReqdForBadThought_BBS_Tag: The amount of blood loss required to trigger a negative thought on blood donation.
LanguageData.StackLimit_BBS_Tag: The allowed stack size for this item.
LanguageData.DaysToRot_BBS_Tag: How many days this item takes to rot away if not kept frozen
LanguageData.SkillRequirement_BBS_Tag: Medical skill level required for applying this item. Applies to self-use and operations.
LanguageData.HitPoints_BBS_Tag: The amount of hit points this item has.
LanguageData.DeteriorationRate_BBS_Tag: How many hit points this item loses each day if left outside.
LanguageData.Nutrition_BBS_Tag: How much nutrition each item provides
LanguageData.HumanBloodCostMeatMultiplier_BBS_Tag: Blood cost is derived from meat cost times this if the meat is humanlike.
LanguageData.AnimalBloodCostMeatMultiplier_BBS_Tag: Blood cost is derived from meat cost times this if the meat is animal.
LanguageData.HediffDefName_BBS_Tag: The hediff to apply on the pawn when this object is used.
LanguageData.EffectTime_BBS_Tag: How long the effect of the product lasts, in days.
